question: Which among the following was NOT a landmark of Alauddin Khilji’s Reign?
option2: Introduction of New Market regulation to provide essential commodities at reasonable rates
option3: Introduction of Fixed price market by appointment of Diwan–I-Riyasat & Shahan-i-mandi
option4: Creation of Agricultural department called Diwan-i-kohi
answer: Creation of Agricultural department called Diwan-i-kohi
explanation: Creation of Agricultural department called Diwan-i-kohi-  landmark of Mohammed Bin Tughlaq reign
